title: CNN analyst makes a grammatical error in a tweet attacking Mollie Hemingway as an ‘intellectual lightweight’
text:
Lawfare Executive Editor and CNN National Security and Legal Analyst Susan Hennessey attacked The Federalist’s Mollie Hemingway, calling her an “intellectual lightweight” and “bottom of the barrel” after Hemingway left a snarky response to one of her tweets:

Schiff has been extraordinarily measured in the past, so it is a big deal to hear this coming from him. https://t.co/DUV0oLW8al — Susan Hennessey (@Susan_Hennessey) September 22, 2019

I laughed. Good one! — Mollie (@MZHemingway) September 22, 2019

Do these intellectual lightweights have a bigger tell that Trump’s got a serious problem then when they try to do the LOL WE’RE TROLLING bit? It’s so transparent and boring. https://t.co/RGf3r9lAFN — Susan Hennessey (@Susan_Hennessey) September 22, 2019

I recognize Hemingway is bottom of the barrel, but even Trumpist significantly smarter than her resort to it. You do you, I guess. Just seems ineffective and lazy. — Susan Hennessey (@Susan_Hennessey) September 22, 2019

First up, it’s “than” not “then”:

Hello, intellectual superior. I am providing a link to help you out for future tweets. https://t.co/7D4S8MHAK6 https://t.co/yu2PiZ5P0K — Matthew (@matthops82) September 22, 2019

Every. Time:

Anytime someone calls another person an intellectual lightweight, it’s an obvious projection. Must be a sad life to be such a person. https://t.co/yu2PiZ5P0K — Matthew (@matthops82) September 22, 2019

But more importantly, why’d she get so nasty?

Personal insults don't suit you or your arguments, Susan. Again, I was laughing at your characterization of Adam Schiff as measured, since he's so obviously not. He claimed he had evidence of Trump's treasonous collusion with Russia, for example, when he definitively did not. — Mollie (@MZHemingway) September 22, 2019

***

Related:

Trump – Ukraine ‘scandal’ is at Watergate proportions according to media analyst Brian Stelter — who does not analyze CNN’s coverage, it seems https://t.co/28w93JVCZR — Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) September 22, 2019

‘You corrupt LOSERS’: Nick Searcy isn’t having ANY of David Axelrod’s lame attempt to cover for Biden’s Ukraine ‘problem’ https://t.co/IEjdGfXakg — Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) September 22, 2019
